TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProfileProviderAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ProfileProviderAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ProfileProviderAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 为用户配置文件属性标识配置文件提供程序。

span.span: Identifies the profile provider for a user-profile property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于标识自定义配置文件实现的属性的配置文件提供程序。The class is used to identify the profile provider for a property of a custom profile implementation. 自定义配置文件实现是继承自 抽象类的类，它定义 [配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) 配置元素中未指定的用户配置文件的属性。A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 您可以使用 `inherits` 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的 [配置](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) 文件配置元素的特性为用户配置文件指定自定义类型，如下面的示例所示。You can specify a custom type for the user profile using the `inherits` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element in the Web.config file for an application, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个继承自类的类， 以创建自定义配置文件。The following code example defines a class that inherits from the class to create a custom profile. 自定义配置文件的类型在 `inherits` 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的 [配置](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) 文件配置元素的属性中指定。The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element in the Web.config file for an application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/CS/employeeprofile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/VB/employeeprofile.vb#1)]

related.span: ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述

param.span: 属性的配置文件提供程序名称。

span.span: The name of the profile provider for the property.

summary.span: 用指定的配置文件提供程序名称创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified profile provider name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于标识自定义配置文件实现的属性的配置文件提供程序。The class is used to identify the profile provider for a property of a custom profile implementation. 自定义配置文件实现是继承自 抽象类的类，它定义 [配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) 配置元素中未指定的用户配置文件的属性。A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个继承自类的类， 以创建自定义配置文件。The following code example defines a class that inherits from the class to create a custom profile. 自定义配置文件的类型在 `inherits` 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的 [配置](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) 文件配置元素的属性中指定。The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element in the Web.config file for an application. 有关指定自定义配置文件实现的配置文件的示例，请参阅 类概述。For an example of a configuration file that specifies a custom profile implementation, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/CS/employeeprofile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/VB/employeeprofile.vb#1)]
